name: Should You?
description:
This game was created for Wowie Jam 3 in 3 days.

Theme: Failure is progress; let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.

Use W,A,S,D and the mouse to eliminate your all of your enemies. They may try to hide, but seek them out and kill them to win! - but is killing and death really a win?

This game explores how a game's win state and a moral win may differ.

All art was created by me, using the colour palette from https://lospec.com/palette-list/cc-29
